title: Bigg Boss 10 November 19 preview: Salman Khan takes a stand, disapproves of Swami Om’s sexist comments
text:
Bigg Boss Season 10 Bigg Boss 10 November 19 preview: Salman Khan takes a stand, disapproves of Swami Om’s sexist comments Bigg Boss 10 November 19 preview: Salman Khan takes a stand, disapproves of Swami Om’s sexist comments Bigg Boss 10: Mouni Roy teaches Salman Khan Naagin dance moves. Written by Arushi Jain | New Delhi  44 pm Bigg Boss 10: Swami Om sobs uncontrollably after Salman Khan takes his class over his sexist comments on Mona Lisa. 
After keeping mum for almost a month, Salman Khan , the host of controversial reality show Bigg Boss 10 has finally realised that it is high time for him to take a stand against the sexist comments of Swami Om. Today in the Weekend Ka ‘Double’ Vaar episode, Salman will warn him to mend his ways and think twice before uttering a word about a woman’s character. He even tells him that he is no one to decide what a woman should wear or should not wear. For Salman, Swami Om is polluting the Indian culture instead of protecting it. . @BeingSalmanKhan has a lot to say to #OmSwami about his behavior in the @BiggBoss house! #BB10WeekendKaDoubleVaar http://t.co/RUIvJi3ON4 
— COLORS (@ColorsTV) November 19, 2016 
Swami Om, who always has his crocodile tears ready to get away from such confrontations, starts sobbing and in his defense, blames the housemates for provoking him. Salman will turn a deaf ear to his clarifications and get straight to the point. He tells him that the relatives of a girl’s family will never take his nonsense and he will be rebuked outside the Bigg Boss house as well. 
More from the world of Entertainment: 

Next, Salman leaves the contestants stunned by revealing the twist of double eviction this week. The tension goes up among the nominated contestants — Rahul Dev, Karan Mehra , Lokesh, and Mona Lisa. 
To lighten the otherwise fueled up atmosphere, Mouni Roy will visit Salman Khan and both the actors will be seen swaying like Naagins. Mouni will even make Salman a villain for a fun game and will entertain the audience in her own way. Later, Tum Bin 2 director, Anubhav Sinha will join Mouni on the stage.
